actions.description: Get a post by post ID.

properties.description: The date the post was published, in the site's timezone.

properties.name: slug

properties.name: status

properties.description: Whether the content is protected with a password.

properties.description: Whether the excerpt is protected with a password.

properties.description: The ID for the author of the post.
properties.name: author

properties.description: The ID of the featured media for the post.
properties.name: featured_media

properties.description: Whether comments are allowed for the post.
properties.name: comment_status

properties.description: Whether pingbacks or trackbacks are allowed.
properties.name: ping_status

properties.description: Weather the post is pinned to the top of the page.
properties.name: sticky

properties.description: The theme file used to display the post.
properties.name: template

properties.name: meta
